list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: form or cause to form into a curved or spiral shape.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her fingers curled around the microphone
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những ngón tay của cô cuộn tròn xung quanh micro

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in weight training) lift (a weight) using only the hands, wrists, and forearms.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: slowly curl the barbell to shoulder height
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Từ từ cuộn tròn đập vào chiều cao vai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: play at the game of curling.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: during the severe spell in 1740, men curled on the pond

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: something having a spiral or inwardly curved form, especially a lock of hair.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her blond hair was a mass of tangled curls
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tóc vàng của cô ấy là một khối các lọn tóc rối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a weightlifting exercise involving movement of only the hands, wrists, and forearms.
the vector product of the operator del and a given vector.
